did.unittitle: National Mediation Board Airline Industry Arbitration Oral History Interviews,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Charles Rehmus's notes from interviews regarding the Railway Labor Act.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of Charles Rehmus's notes from interviews regarding the Railway Labor Act, conducted in 1984. Interviews were conducted with Robert Brown, Nancy Coppersmith, Chuck Hopkins, Sheldon Kline, David Lee, Kay McMurray, Gail Opperman, Laurette Piculin, Robert Pike, Roland Quinn, Andrew Ripp, Jack Sage, Susan Bianchi-Sand, Joe Smith, David Stowe, Art Brennan, Seth Rosen, John Bradley, Joe Anderson, John Willits, Walter Wallace, Charles Thomson, Tom Tracy, Ben Aaron, Phillip Ross, John Sytesma, Ralph Colliander, Jim Conway, Dick Cosgrave, Bill Donlon, Dana Eischen, Fred Hardin, Robert Harris, Tom Ingles, George Ives, Richard Kasher, John Peterpaul, Helen Witt.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: National Mediation Board Airline Industry Arbitration Oral History Interviews #5748 OHM. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Interviews with Robert Brown, Nancy Coppersmith, Chuck Hopkins, Sheldon Kline, David Lee, Kay McMurray, Gail Opperman, Laurette Piculin, Robert Pike, Roland Quinn, Andrew Ripp, Jack Sage, Susan Bianchi-Sand, Joe Smith, David Stowe, Art Brennan, Seth Rosen, John Bradley, Joe Anderson, John Willits, Walter Wallace, Charles Thomson, Tom Tracy, Ben Aaron, Phillip Ross, John Sytsma, Ralph Colliander, Jim Conway, Dick Cosgrave, Bill Donlon, Dana Eischen, Fred Hardin, Robert Harris, Tom Ingles, George Ives, Richard Kasher, John Peter Paul, Helen Witt.
